Position Description Advertised Job Summary The research specialist will work with the faculty principal investigator and grant staff to assist with NIH-funded research on early development in high-risk groups of infants and toddlers with neurodevelopmental disorders (e.g., fragile X syndrome). This position assists in conducting assessments, managing data, organizing findings, and preparing reports.
